document_data.name: Umbarl Darlhoun
document_data.mainbody: '''Umbarl Darlhoun''' was a [[War Wizard of Cormyr]].
document_data.History: In [[1480 DR]], Darlhoun was on duty in [[High Horn]]'s garrison. However, Lord [[Erevon Sunter|Sunter]], the garrison's head, one day found Darlhoun's body dismembered.
document_data.Personality: Darlhoun was a cheerful individual, always nice, sympathetic, and diligent.
